

# (PART) Importing 

# vroom  

**vroom**[@R-vroom]

https://vroom.r-lib.org/  

```{r,echo=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache=T)
```


```{r}
library(vroom)
```


```{r}
file_path <- vroom_example("mtcars.csv")
vroom(file_path)
```


```{r}
spec(vroom(file_path))
```



```{r}
compressed <- vroom_example("mtcars.csv.zip")
vroom(compressed)
```



```{r}
vroom(compressed, col_select = c(model, cyl, gear))
```


```{r}
mtcars
```
